name: The Dark Maze (itch)
description:
You make up in a mysterious maze and you don't know how you got there. There are only two ways out, finding all 4 tokens or dying at the hand of whatever else is in the maze
Controls:
WASD: Move
Mouse: Look
Shift: Run

To Fully Enjoy The Game, Please Play With:
Graphics -  Medium or Higher
Resolution - The Biggest It Can Be
Full Screen if Possible

This game was made in 2 1/2 days
Also available on Gamejolt :  Gamejolt Page
